summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Discord Bot Dashboard - Iteration 6. All 21 backend API tests passed (100% success rate). Frontend UI fully functional with login, dashboard navigation, Temp Channels, Tickets, and Leveling pages all working correctly.
passed_tests: API: POST /api/auth/login - 200 OK (admin@test.de / admin123)
API: POST /api/auth/login with invalid credentials - 401 Unauthorized
API: GET /api/auth/me with valid token - 200 OK
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators - 200 OK
API: POST /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators - 200 OK (creates with all options)
API: POST temp-creator with numbering_type=letter - 200 OK
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators/{creatorId} - 200 OK
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators/nonexistent - 404 Not Found
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels - 200 OK
API: POST /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels - 200 OK (creates with categories, custom_fields)
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels/{panelId} - 200 OK
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels/nonexistent - 404 Not Found
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/tickets - 200 OK
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/tickets/stats - 200 OK (open, claimed, closed, total)
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/level-rewards - 200 OK
API: POST /api/guilds/{guildId}/level-rewards - 200 OK
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/level-rewards/{rewardId} - 200 OK
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/server-data - 200 OK
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId} - 200 OK
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/leaderboard - 200 OK
API: GET /api/bot/status - 200 OK

Frontend: Guild ID input and Speichern button working

Frontend: Temp Kanäle page shows Aktive Temp-Channels section
Frontend: Temp Kanäle page shows Discord Befehle section

Frontend: Creator dialog has Kanal-Name Template with variables
Frontend: Creator dialog has Nummerierung dropdown (Zahlen, Buchstaben, etc.)
Frontend: Creator dialog has Position dropdown (Oben, Unten)
Frontend: Creator dialog has Standard Benutzerlimit slider
Frontend: Creator dialog has Standard Bitrate dropdown
Frontend: Creator dialog has 7 Benutzer-Berechtigungen toggles

Frontend: Tickets page shows Letzte Tickets section
Frontend: Tickets page shows Discord Befehle section

Frontend: Panel dialog has Button Emoji, Button Text fields
Frontend: Panel dialog has Ticket-Kanal Name template
Frontend: Panel dialog has Support-Team section with role selectors
Frontend: Panel dialog has Claimen/Transcripts toggles
Frontend: Panel dialog has Ticket-Kategorien (Dropdown) section
Frontend: Leveling page loads with Leveling System header

critical_code_review_comments: All API endpoints properly implemented with correct CRUD operations
Login API working correctly with JWT token authentication
Temp Creators API supports all numbering types and permission options
Ticket Panels API supports categories, custom_fields, support_roles, ping_roles
Level Rewards API supports role and emoji reward types
Server Data API returns roles, channels, categories, emojis structure
Frontend dialogs have all required fields with proper validation
Role/Channel selectors show 'Keine Daten' when bot hasn't synced - expected behavior
UI design is consistent with Discord-style dark theme
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_ prefixed temp creators, ticket panels, and level rewards during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs working: /api/auth/login, /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators (GET, POST, DELETE), /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels (GET, POST, DELETE), /api/guilds/{guildId}/tickets (GET, stats), /api/guilds/{guildId}/level-rewards (GET, POST, DELETE), /api/guilds/{guildId}/server-data (GET), /api/guilds/{guildId} (GET), /api/guilds/{guildId}/leaderboard (GET), /api/bot/status (GET). Frontend fully functional with login, dashboard navigation, and all feature pages. Role/Channel selectors show 'Keine Daten' when Discord bot hasn't synced server data - this is expected behavior. Test credentials: admin@test.de / admin123, Guild ID: 807292920734547969.
